title: Substituting N into Formula
text: Substitute each value of n into the formula. Begin with $$n=1$$ to find the first term, a1. To find the second term, a2, use all n terms.

title: Finding All Needed Values
text: Continue in the same manner until you have identified all n terms.

title: First 8 Terms of Sequence
text: What are the first 8 terms of the sequence?
